title: ICE: when specifiying explicit chumsky State

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
The error only comes up if ```rust .map_with_state(|_, span, state| state.0[span]); ``` is changed to ```rust .map_with_state(|_, span, state: State| state.0[span]); ``` and ```rust just::<_, SpannedInput, extra::State<&mut str>>(Token::Ident) ``` is changed to ```rust just::<_, SpannedInput, extra::State>(Token::Ident) ``` All other cases are still erronous but only these two combined result in this internal compiler error. ### Code GitHub: https://github.com/CreatorSiSo/rustc_internal_bug_1 ```Cargo.toml [package] name = "rustc_internal_bug_1" version = "0.1.0" edition = "2021" [dependencies] chumsky = { git = "https://github.com/zesterer/chumsky", rev = "ac31aea841c395138aee43ff5139fb49d4a9a60c" } ``` ```Rust use chumsky::input::SpannedInput; use chumsky::prelude::*; fn main() { type Span = std::ops::Range; #[derive(Clone, PartialEq, Eq)] enum Token { Ident, } struct State<'a>(&'a str); let ident_parser = just::<_, SpannedInput, extra::State>(Token::Ident) .map_with_state(|_, span, state: State| state.0[span]); ident_parser.parse_with_state(&[(Token::Ident, 0..7)].spanned(7..7), State("testing")); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.68.0 (2c8cc3432 2023-03-06) binary: rustc commit-hash: 2c8cc343237b8f7d5a3c3703e3a87f2eb2c54a74 commit-date: 2023-03-06 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.68.0 LLVM version: 15.0.6 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_infer/src/infer/region_constraints/mod.rs:568:17: cannot relate bound region: ReLateBound(DebruijnIndex(0), BoundRegion { var: 0, kind: BrNamed(DefId(0:23 ~ rustc_internal_bug_1[4a0a]::main::'_), '_) }) <= '_#20r thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/2c8cc343237b8f7d5a3c3703e3a87f2eb2c54a74/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:987:33 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f877756659a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h595f06c70adcc478 at /rustc/2c8cc343237b8f7d5a3c3703e3a87f2eb2c54a74/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f877756659a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::h177a0149c76cdde9 at /rustc/2c8cc343237b8f7d5a3c3703e3a87f2eb2c54a74/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7f877756659a - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt::hc0701fd2c3530c58 at /rustc/2c8cc343237b8f7d5a3c3703e3a87f2eb2c54a74/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:65:5 3: 0x7f877756659a -
